summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Thackery Place, from East 45th Street to East 50th Street; East 50th Street, from Thackeray Place to Latona Avenue; and Latona Avenue from East 50th Street to East 65th Street; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 330 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
